import React from 'react' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js'; import Modal from "react-bootstrap/Modal"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export const ScheduleEvent = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = React.useState(false); const showModal = () => { setIsOpen(true);}; const hideModal = () => { setIsOpen(false);}; return ( <>
Create New Event
With Ayush Gupta
Add a Co-host or Guest
{/* */}
Add People
Done
Euro News
Last seen: 2 hours ago
Euro News
Last seen: 2 hours ago
Euro News
Last seen: 2 hours ago
Euro News
Last seen: 2 hours ago
Date Today
Time 18:00
Replays
Publish
) } export default ScheduleEvent;
